data.name: email
data.helpText: Beware not to overuse email as a communication mode.

data.name: phoneCall
data.helpText: Give you the opportunity to introduce changes as well as clarify any areas of uncertainty.

data.name: faceToFaceConversation
data.helpText: Allows you to gauge people's emotional responses and get feedback on any points that may not be well understood.

data.name: executivePresentation
data.helpText: Visible involvement of senior leaders is one of the leading contributors to project change success.

data.name: newsletter
data.helpText: Reach a wide audience in a manner that gives the message credibility.

data.name: socialMedia
data.helpText: Provide continuous updates about the change and engages and involves staff in a change.

data.name: intranet
data.helpText: Can provide detailed and up-to-date information about the project and changes happening.

data.name: poster
data.helpText: Create visibility for upcoming projects and can be used to feed information about changes they will bring.

data.name: coaching
data.helpText: Help people develop skills, attitudes and goals to assist them to adapt to changes.

data.name: presentation
data.helpText: Offer detailed information, use visual aids and respond to questions in real-time.

data.name: videoConference
data.helpText: Allows you to share information in an interactive manner to geographically dispersed audiences.

data.name: meeting
data.helpText: Share information about project changes, answer questions and gain feedback in an informal manner.

data.name: demonstration
data.helpText: Showing people how to do something can be much more memorable and effective than merely them how to do something.

data.name: explainerVideo
data.helpText: Communicate changes and instructions quickly in an easy to understand, repeatable and easily shared manner.

data.name: roadshow
data.helpText: A planned series of presentations to audiences around the organization to introduce the project and changes. Ideally involve senior leaders.

data.name: superUserSupport
data.helpText: One-on-one mentoring from a person who understands a new system or process. Particularly useful for process & technology changes.

data.name: jobAid
data.helpText: Simple, easy to read guides reduce axiety about what to do and help those people affected by changes to feel supported.

data.name: celebration
data.helpText: Celebrating successful adoption of changes reinforces those changes and helps build long-term commitment to the new way of doing things.

data.name: publicRecognition
data.helpText: Communicates that adapting positive change behaviors is valued. Improves people's willingness to adapt to changes in the future.

data.name: reward
data.helpText: Incentives for adapting to changes are a powerful motivator, and must be planned carefully.

data.name: oneOnOneTraining
data.helpText: Allows for rich sharing of experiences, instructions, information and ideas. Any concerns or questions can be clarified immediately.

data.name: workshop
data.helpText: Provides people with an opportunity to learn concepts and skills and ask questions.

data.name: elearning
data.helpText: Useful for building skills in geographically dispersed groups in an on-demand manner.

data.name: writtenMaterials
data.helpText: Can be provided as references online or as printed guides to help ensure people understand what they need to do.

data.name: other
data.helpText: Describe the activity in the 'Description' field.
